gmx:name.gco:CharacterString: Feature catalog for Fish Passage Barriers: San Francisco Bay Area, California, 2009

gmx:scope.gco:CharacterString: Hydrography; Urban watersheds; Conservation of natural resources; Waterways; Rivers; Fishes--Migration; Corridors (Ecology); Wildland-urban interface

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Internal feature number.
Feature geometry.
Unique ID linking to additional information from the database (Interstate ID, 700,000 - 799,000)
Internal unique ID.
Name of a stream the structure is located in.
Tributary to.
Structure/site name.

Type of instream structure/site. See PAD Methodology for structure types and additional details, available on the Calfish website: http://www.calfish.org/portals/2/ProgramsProjects/FishPassage/PADMethodology_May2009.doc

Barrier status of the structure/site. See PAD Methodology for barrier status categories used, available on the Calfish website: http://www.calfish.org/portals/2/ProgramsProjects/FishPassage/PADMethodology_May2009.doc

Protocol used to assess barrier status of the structure/site (DFG Restoration Manual, FishXing Software, Professional Judgement, Caltrans Reconnaissance Protocol, Caltrans Detailed Protocol, Field Survey).
Agency or individual assessing barrier status of the structure/site.
Date of the field survey.
Barrier treatment status (Planned, Ongoing, Completed, Unknown).
Date the structure was removed, modified or remediated.
Owner of the structure.
Owner of the land.
Notes further describing the structure/site.
Priority category assigned by the data collecting entity.
PAD priority assigned by PAD administrators (see Methodology for details).
Is the barrier a keystone, e.g. impassable barrier closest to the ocean?
Additional notes with regards to priority rank.
Federal HUC unit (HUC_8_NAME), USGS
County name.
Hydrologic Region (Calwater 2.2.1).
Hydrologic Unit (Calwater 2.2.1).
Hydrologic Area (Calwater 2.2.1).
Hydrologic Subarea (Calwater 2.2.1).
Calwater number (Calwater 2.2.1).
Stream reach ID, from indexing to 24k National Hydrography Dataset (NHD).
Stream reach measure, from indexing to 24k National Hydrography Dataset (NHD).
CalHydro stream unique ID (100K California Hydrography).
CalHydro stream location address (begft) from snapping to 100K California Hydrography.
Diversion ID.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Number of pumps or drains when multiples occur on a single platform.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Outside diameter of intake or drain (inches); 99 value indicates unknown size; 999 value indicates a weir, dam, ladder or pump platform with multiple intakes that total over 60 inches.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Horsepower rating for each pump (hp).

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: Maximum diversion capacity of the water intake (cfs).

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: The screen met DFG and/or NMFS screening criteria for salmon, steelhead or delta smelt when installed or met criteria on date of survey.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: If any entrainment monitoring has been conducted (yes/no).

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DFG Fish Screen & Fish Passage Program

gfc:definition.gco:CharacterString: All datasources providing data to the PAD.
Record last updated in the PAD.
Web legend category, for web mapping service only.
State highway route number.
State highway post mile number.
Photo path for web mapping service only.
Total intrinsic potential upstream (see Methodology for details).
Intrisic potential category for legend display in web mapping services only.
Order of the barrier within intrinsic potential geometric network.
Specific treatment recommendation suggestions to remediate the barrier.
